content:
## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Coal Mining and Transport System
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner Mining Drill at position (40.0, -84.0)
- Transport belts connecting from (41.5, -85.5) to (41.5, -81.5)
- Burner Inserter at position (40.5, -82.5) transferring items from the mining drill to the wooden chest
- Wooden Chest at position (40.5, -81.5) storing coal
- Iron Chest at position (42.5, -80.5) storing coal

### Iron Plate Production
Consists of the following entities:
- Stone Furnace at position (-15.0, -49.0) for smelting iron ore into iron plates

### Transport Belt Network
Consists of multiple belt groups and individual belts facilitating the movement of items across the map:
- BeltGroup with inputs from (50.5, -86.5) to (48.5, -86.5) and outputs from (49.5, -86.5) to (47.5, -86.5)
- BeltGroup with inputs from (54.5, -86.5) to (52.5, -86.5) and outputs from (52.5, -82.5) to (53.5, -83.5)
- BeltGroup with inputs from (41.5, -85.5) to (41.5, -83.5) and outputs from (41.5, -83.5) to (41.5, -81.5)
- Additional belts connecting various points on the map for item transport

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors when placing chests
- Ensure there is a clear and suitable position for placing chests. Avoid attempting to place a chest where there is an existing object.

### Errors when connecting belts directly to chests
- Use an inserter to input items into a chest instead of connecting belts directly to the chest.

### Errors when placing inserters
- Verify there is enough space for placing an inserter. Ensure the target position is not occupied by another entity.

### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items.
